Smart Tape Measure: A tape measure that uses sensors and a smartphone app to provide real-time measurements and visual representations of the measured object.
Tape Measure with Augmented Reality: A tape measure that uses augmented reality to provide a 3D visual representation of the measured object.
Tape Measure with Voice Commands: A tape measure that uses voice commands to measure objects and provide the measurement in real-time.
Tape Measure with Built-in Level: A tape measure that includes a built-in level to ensure accurate and level measurements.
Tape Measure with Multiple Measurement Units: A tape measure that can measure in multiple units such as inches, centimeters, and millimeters.
